content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In this section we will talk about QMS – Quality Management System – employed by the Company: how it is built, why it is important to observe its requirements and recommendations. This material and Check yourself section are mandatory for reading and execution by all employees of the company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is QMS?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS is a system for managing different aspects of the Company's work, which directly or indirectly affects product quality. In other words, these are the rules and principles that are the basis of the Company's operation. All these rules answer one question: “How should the work on a project be organized to ensure its success?”\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS may be perceived as a type of framework that helps to ensure the creation of a top-quality product.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Aim of QMS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This system is required for assuring and increasing product quality. Why? To increase profits and minimize expenses. The quality of our products and services directly affects the Company's reputation and the number of clients, and, consequentially, the Company's revenue.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is QMS important for you? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thanks to the adherence to EPAM QMS rules, your work in the Company and in a project is performed according to the rules known in advance. You can easily adapt yourself while passing from one Company's project to another. Documented processes, guidelines and instructions allow solving working issues using accumulated experience of other teams. Project documentation helps to avoid keeping large amount of information in mind and to find necessary things rather quickly. You can fulfill project tasks, solve arising problems and plan your activity much easier. Level of misunderstanding and probability of miscommunication in a project and with the Customer decreases significantly, improving emotional atmosphere in the team and job satisfaction greatly.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why do you need to know this?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To have an understanding of how our Company operates, where necessary information can be found, and, in case a client asks you “Do you have QMS?” you are able to answer confidently Yes! . In some instances clients have turned to other companies because they want assurance that their money will not be wasted. QMS is a set of documents that define the rules of the game.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is it necessary to create a huge number of documents and make the system so formalized?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The thing is, the bigger the company – the harder it is to organize its operation and to manage all projects.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In a small company (6-8 employees) introducing formalized procedures is pointless in such small numbers, all employees always know everything and are able to discuss all issues and make production plans over a cup of coffee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the staff numbers increase informal communication becomes no longer sufficient. As a result, an ordinary employee may fail to obtain necessary project information, miss the deadline or damage product quality. That's why there is a demand for managers who coordinate the work of project teams.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What will happen if these rules are not established or ignored?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who submitted this bug? – Unknown. – A lot of time is spent on the implementation of functionality that had already been implemented, because that process had not been tracked in any way. Building of a product turns into an uncontrolled process where coding is not version-controlled, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to avoid such problems, it is important for a large company to establish corporate rules. EPAM, in particular, has more than 14000 staff members (see picture 1), so functioning without formalized rules (Quality Management System) is impossible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/130990b1-3118-4c21-8c6c-15c22512dac3/Headcount.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":783,\"height\":324}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, 0, 0)\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"font-size\":\"medium\",\"font-style\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-ligatures\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-caps\":\"normal\",\"font-weight\":\"400\",\"letter-spacing\":\"normal\",\"orphans\":\"2\",\"text-align\":\"start\",\"text-indent\":\"0px\",\"text-transform\":\"none\",\"white-space\":\"normal\",\"widows\":\"2\",\"word-spacing\":\"0px\",\"-webkit-text-stroke-width\":\"0px\",\"text-decoration-style\":\"initial\",\"text-decoration-color\":\"initial\",\"display\":\"inline !important\",\"float\":\"none\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Picture 1 - Growth of the EPAM personnel pool, years 2002 – 2014\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions about this section, please seek assistance from your Manager.
